name: Ettin
movement: walking speed of 40 feet, can close in quickly
description: A massive, two-headed giant wielding crude weapons with each head often arguing yet working together in battle.
memorable: Its dual-head ability allows it to perceive threats effectively and resist common incapacitating conditions.
goals: Highly territorial, attacks any intruders without hesitation.
relations: Commonly found in isolated areas, possibly seen with other giants.
environment: Lives in caves or ruins, in isolated areas.
strengths: Strong in melee combat with high Strength score and advantage on perception and saving throws.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity reduces agility and susceptibility to ranged attacks.
attacks: Can perform multiple attacks with weapons like a battleaxe and clubs that deal significant damage; has a special attack called Axe Whirl.
most_powerful_ability: Reactive Heads allows it to take two reactions per round.
senses: Possesses advantageous perception due to its two heads, increasing its passive perception to 17.
skills: Noteworthy for having high perception skills, benefiting from two heads.
additional_information: Can take two reactions each round.
Has a bonus action called 'That One!' to gain attack advantage.
Equipped with a Knobbed Club and a Spiked Club for melee attacks.
Wakeful ability prevents easy ambush by keeping one head alert.
Resistant to being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, and stunned.
